product_name: Light & Motion Vis 360 Plus Helmet Light
long_description: Delivering a full 360deg of light, the Light & Motion Vis 360 Plus is a helmet-mounting light system that includes both front and rear lights, making it great for commutes and road rides. Front light offers 250 lumens of output to illuminate your way or alert oncomers; directional amber side markers on the front light enhances visibility from the sides. Powerful flashing rear light alerts those behind you to your presence; rear light can be toggled off for when you're riding in a group or to save battery power. Designed to mount to a wide variety of helmet designs, the quick-release mounts affix easily via adjustable straps. Battery charge indicator lets you know how much power remains; lightweight integrated lithium ion battery charges via Micro USB.
